Xiaohua Huang
Matti Taini
Stan Z Li
Matti Pietik√§inen
dcterms:description: Includes 480 image sequences of 80 subjects taken in a constrained environment with normal illumination conditions. For each subject, there are six sequences, one for each of the six basic emotion labels. Each sequence begins with a neutral facial expression and ends with the apex of the expression. For both training and testing, the last three peak frames are used to represent the video resulting in 1440 images.
dcterms:title: Oulu-CASIA

dcterms:creator: Abhinav Dhall
OV Ramana Murthy
Roland Goecke
Jyoti Joshi
Tom Gedeon
dcterms:description: Consists of 1,322 static images labeled with seven facial expressions (the six basic plus the neutral one). This dataset has been collected from real movies and targets spontaneous expression recognition in challenging, i.e., in-the-wild, environments.
dcterms:title: Static Facial Expression in the Wild (SFEW)
